summary: Full-stack computer product e-commerce platform with user authentication, admin panel for product management, shopping cart, checkout, order tracking, and Stripe payment integration
architectural_notes: Using Internet Identity for user authentication
Admin panel separated from customer-facing interface
Order status workflow: Pending → Processing → Shipped → Delivered

existing_features.title: Create an admin panel that allows administrators to add, edit, and delete computer products with fields for name, description, price, category, and image
Integrate Stripe payment processing to handle secure online payments with test mode support
Create an order tracking system that displays order history with status updates: Pending, Processing, Shipped, and Delivered
Apply a modern, professional visual design with a cohesive color scheme appropriate for a technology retail business, using clean typography and consistent spacing throughout the interface

new_feature_requests.summary: User authentication with Internet Identity login
Admin panel for adding/editing computer products
Checkout system with contact details (phone: 9315906829, email: panerudaya11@gmail.com)
Order tracking with status updates (Pending → Processing → Shipped → Delivered)
Stripe payment integration for secure online payments
Implement user authentication using Internet Identity, allowing users to securely log in and log out
Build a shopping cart system that allows users to add products, adjust quantities, remove items, and view the total price
Implement a checkout flow that collects shipping information and processes payments, displaying contact details phone: 9315906829 and email: panerudaya11@gmail.com
Display a product catalog showcasing computer products organized by categories with product images, descriptions, and prices in INR
